trips.title: Costa Rica Adventure
trips.description: Experience the magic of Costa Rica with our all-inclusive adventure package. From lush rainforests to pristine beaches, this trip has it all.
trips.heroTagline: 7 days of adventure, wildlife, and unforgettable memories

itinerary.title: Arrival & Welcome
itinerary.description: Arrive at San José airport where our team will greet you. Transfer to your boutique hotel and enjoy a welcome dinner with the group.

itinerary.title: Arenal Volcano
itinerary.description: Travel to Arenal Volcano. Hike through lava fields and relax in natural hot springs.

itinerary.title: Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Zip-lining through the cloud forest canopy and white water rafting on the Pacuare River.

itinerary.title: Monteverde Cloud Forest
itinerary.description: Explore the mystical Monteverde Cloud Forest. Night walk to spot nocturnal wildlife.

itinerary.title: Manuel Antonio
itinerary.description: Travel to Manuel Antonio. Afternoon at the beach with optional surfing lessons.

itinerary.title: National Park & Cooking
itinerary.description: Morning hike in Manuel Antonio National Park. Afternoon cooking class with local chef.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Farewell breakfast and transfer to San José airport for your flight home.

packages.title: Standard
packages.description: Shared room accommodation with all activities included

packages.title: Premium
packages.description: Private room with upgraded accommodations and spa access

packages.title: VIP
packages.description: Luxury suite, private guide, and exclusive experiences

trips.title: Greek Islands Escape
trips.description: Sail through the stunning Greek Islands, exploring ancient ruins, pristine beaches, and charming villages. A perfect blend of history, culture, and relaxation.

itinerary.title: Athens Arrival
itinerary.description: Welcome to Greece! Explore the Acropolis and enjoy dinner with views of the Parthenon.

itinerary.title: Ferry to Mykonos
itinerary.description: Morning ferry to Mykonos. Explore the iconic windmills and Little Venice.

itinerary.title: Delos & Beach Day
itinerary.description: Day trip to ancient Delos. Afternoon at Paradise Beach.

itinerary.title: Sail to Santorini
itinerary.description: Private yacht sail to Santorini with swimming stops along the way.

itinerary.title: Santorini Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Oia, wine tasting, and the famous Santorini sunset.

itinerary.title: Cooking & Culture
itinerary.description: Morning cooking class. Afternoon at Red Beach and Akrotiri ruins.

itinerary.title: Free Day
itinerary.description: Explore at your own pace. Optional catamaran cruise available.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning flight back to Athens for international connections.

packages.title: Deluxe
packages.description: Private room with sea views and upgraded experiences

trips.title: Japan Cultural Immersion
trips.description: Dive deep into Japanese culture with this immersive 10-day journey. From ancient temples to modern Tokyo, experience the best of Japan.
trips.heroTagline: Where ancient traditions meet modern innovation

itinerary.title: Tokyo Arrival
itinerary.description: Welcome to Japan! Check into your hotel in Shinjuku and explore the neon-lit streets.

itinerary.title: Tokyo Highlights
itinerary.description: Visit Senso-ji Temple, Harajuku, and Shibuya Crossing. Evening at Robot Restaurant.

itinerary.title: Hakone & Mt. Fuji
itinerary.description: Day trip to Hakone. Cable car, pirate ship cruise, and Mt. Fuji views.

itinerary.title: Bullet Train to Kyoto
itinerary.description: Experience the Shinkansen to Kyoto. Afternoon at Fushimi Inari Shrine.

itinerary.title: Kyoto Temples
itinerary.description: Visit Kinkaku-ji, Arashiyama bamboo grove, and traditional tea ceremony.

itinerary.title: Geisha District
itinerary.description: Morning at Gion. Afternoon sushi making class. Evening geisha performance.

itinerary.title: Nara Day Trip
itinerary.description: Visit Nara's friendly deer and the giant Buddha at Todai-ji Temple.

itinerary.title: Osaka
itinerary.description: Travel to Osaka. Street food tour in Dotonbori and Osaka Castle.

itinerary.title: Free Day
itinerary.description: Explore on your own or join optional activities. Farewell dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to Osaka Kansai Airport for your flight home.

packages.title: Essential
packages.description: Comfortable 3-star hotels with all core experiences

packages.title: Premium
packages.description: 4-star hotels with ryokan stay and extra experiences

packages.title: Luxury
packages.description: 5-star hotels, private guide, and exclusive access
